item.description:
As many of you know, Nicole is a member of the steering committee at I.I. for the global network of Integral Meetup Chapters. Last summer, after a few discussions with the CEO of Integral Institute, Robb Smith - Nicole and Robb shared a few thoughts on how to help Ken Wilber meet-up groups move more towards a vehicle for growth - one that takes the theory of Integral from the realm of ideas and into the world of form, action, practice and evolution.

We all feel that we have an amazing opportunity to redefine this group and take it to the next level. In many ways - we have the opportunity to pave the way for other groups all over the world. To do this, it takes vision, organization, dedication, compensation, action/involvement and commitment.

For our next meeting, John and Nicole of Samadhi, would like to facilitate a discussion about the vision, tone and direction of this group.

The basic topic for discussion will be

Remaining a Discussion Group VS. Becoming a Practice Group and what each of those mean.

We do hope to see as many members as possible for this meeting! This is our Integral "We" space and we want to get as much input as possible.
item.name: Boston Ken Wilber Group February Meetup
